definitions.title: n.pr.m. Araunah,
definitions.body: a Jebusite—´[[א]] 2Sa 24:20, 2Sa 24:20, 2Sa 24:21, 2Sa 24:22, 2Sa 24:23 (but rd. [[עֶבֶד אֲדׂנַי]] cf. We Dr) v:2Sa 24:23; v:2Sa 24:24; Kt [[גּׁרֶן האורנה]] v:2Sa 24:16 (Qr [[הָאֲרַוְנׇה]]) c. art. but cf. Dr; Kt [[ארניה]] ´[[ג]] v:2Sa 24:18 (Qr [[אֲרַוְנׇה]]); = [[אָרְנׇן]] (q.v.) 1Ch 21:15 f; LXX in S & Ch )Orna.
